articles.description: Beyoncé posted her first-ever TikTok on Thursday and used the moment to highlight some of the creators and fans who have celebrated her new single, "Break My Soul."

articles.author: Michael Kaplan
articles.title: Widow reveals what it was like watching Mark Fleischman die by legal suicide - New York Post
articles.description: Recalling her final moments with Studio 54 owner Mark Fleischman, her husband of 24 years, Mimi tells The Post that “I didn’t cry. I was overwhelmed and relieved that he is free.”
articles.content:
As Mark Fleischman drank the sodium pentothal that would kill him on Wednesday, he gazed at Mimi, his wife of 27 years. 
“We looked at each other like, ‘This is crazy in a way.’ My feeling was, ‘Wow… [+8335 chars]

articles.title: Dean Fleischer Camp to Direct Live-Action Lilo and Stitch for Disney - Gizmodo
articles.description: Fleischer Camp most recently helmed A24's acclaimed Marcel the Shell With Shoes On.
articles.content: Disneys live-action Lilo and Stitch movie has found its director in Dean Fleischer Camp, as reported by Deadline. The feature is set to follow upcoming releases based on Walt Disney Animation classic… [+1293 chars]

articles.title: Mike Judge's Beavis and Butt-Head Gets a Premiere Date on Paramount+ - IGN
articles.description: Mike Judge's Beavis and Butt-Head will officially premiere on Paramount+ on August 4, 2022.
articles.content:
The idiotic duo of Beavis and Butt-Head
